alert.note: Alert for McLean; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 4:09AM EST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following river in Kentucky... Green River at Calhoun affecting Webster and McLean Counties. .Additional rainfall expected this week in the Green River Basin, in addition to backwater from the Ohio River will generate a series of water rises on the Green River at Calhoun through the end of February. For the Green River...including Paradise, Calhoun...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Calhoun. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 20.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.9 feet this afternoon, with a further rise above flood stage early Friday afternoon. It will then rise to 26.5 feet early Monday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
